test-case.name: deleteStoredArtifactBySHA1Hash
test-case.description: Verfies that an artifact can be deleted in the file-system repository

test-case.name: getStoredArtifactBasedOnSHA1Hash
test-case.description: Verfies that an artifact can be successfully stored in the file-system repository

test-case.name: deleteStoredArtifactOfTenant
test-case.description: Verfies that all artifacts of a tenant can be deleted in the file-system repository

test-case.name: storeSuccessfully
test-case.description: Verfies that an artifact can be successfully stored in the file-system repository

test-case.name: deleteArtifactWhichDoesNotExistsBySHA1HashWithoutException
test-case.description: Verfies that an artifact which does not exists is deleted quietly in the file-system repository

label.name: story
label.value: Test storing artifact binaries in the file-system

label.name: feature
label.value: Unit Tests - Artifact File System Repository
